tourName: Gastronomic Getaway to Leading Cape Town Wine Estates
generalInfo: Cape cuisine is steeped in South African heritage, and it brilliantly retains the authentic traditions while pioneering diverse creativity. Furthermore, the greater Western Cape region has played a significant role in influencing the country’s viticulture. The city and neighboring towns boast world-class wine routes complete with prestigious estates and immaculate vistas of the sprawling landscape and rugged mountains. On this 9-day trip, you will revel in award-winning meals that are paired with exceptional wines to uncover the history behind the pinnacle of Cape destinations. For the devoted foodies and cultured wine connoisseurs, the distinguished flavors of the greater Cape region await you and your palate.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town – The Constantia Charm
dayInfo.description: Cape Town is a highly sought-after destination and, and as you swoop down over the Western Cape, you will quickly realize why. Rugged mountain ranges tower up from the Earth, and white sand beaches sprawl across the coastline to lead into turquoise waters. The city, which is nestled at the foot of Table Mountain, blends sophistication and traditional charm. You will witness all of this and more as you peer out over the greater Cape Town region. You will meet your private transfer shortly after landing at Cape Town International Airport. Grab your belongings and settle into a first-class vehicle for a comfortable scenic drive to the Constantia suburb. Constantia is a premier destination that is situated beneath the striking Table Mountain. It is a beautiful area which boasts luxurious 5-star guesthouses. Furthermore, it is home to Cape Town’s world-renowned wine estates. Set amongst rolling green hills and surrounded by indigenous wildlife, this tranquil village will be the perfect place to call home. Upon arrival, you will check-in to your luxurious villa. Stunning vistas of the evergreen fields and imposing mountain range will welcome you from your private balcony. You will transfer to an award-winning restaurant in the evening. The Michelin Style restaurant, which is located in the heart of the Constantia Valley, will offer an elegant taste of South African cuisine. You will catch the scent of tantalizing dishes as they are prepared by the master chef. The delectable candlelit dinner will be splendidly paired with prestigious local wines, and a toast to your adventure ahead will bring the evening to a perfect end.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town – The Origins of Cape Viticulture
dayInfo.description: You will begin your morning in the comfort of your private villa with an elegant breakfast. A spread of traditional pastries, local cheeses, and freshly squeezed juices will set a blissful tone for your day. You can spend some time lounging around the pool and strolling through the diverse Constantia Greenbelt. The sun will peak through the greenbelt’s canopy and warm the dewy ground where the lush foliage encompasses its winding trails. Early risers and their furry companions will share friendly smiles as you go. A short walk from the greenbelt and you will arrive back home. Afterward, a luxurious private transfer will collect you for an in-depth tour of your destination’s famous wine estates. The Western Cape has a deeply rooted viticulture history with its first bottle of wine being produced decades ago in the city of Cape Town. Hence, some of the provinces longest-established wine estates can be found along the Constantia Wine Route. You will transfer to pivotal estates and spend time discovering each unique vintage and blend. The distinguished flavors of each estate will resonate from their bold wines. You will learn more about the winemaking process as your cultured tasting guides share valuable notes with each sip. You will also capture stunning vistas of the far-reaching vineyards, creating lifelong memories at each stop. The tour will culminate at the tip of the valley where you will indulge in a fine-dining lunch. After your immersive taste wine tour, you will connect with your private transfer and journey over the back of the valley to the Hout Bay suburb. The seaside suburb is a charming destination that is complete with sunny shores and a thriving little harbor. Your knowledgeable guide will share valuable information about the history of this fishing village, and you will browse the colorful markets of Hout Bay, delving into the rich Cape Malay culture during the trip. After which, you will arrive at an immaculate dining destination for cocktails and seafood that overlooks the rugged mountains and deep blue ocean. The setting sun will provide the perfect backdrop for your evening, and after dinner, you will travel along the famously magnificent Chapman’s Peak for uninterrupted landscape views. Shortly after, you will settle into the tranquility of your private suite in Constantia.

dayInfo.title: Paarl – Paarl’s Precious Heritage
dayInfo.description: The third day of your trip will begin in style with a delicious English breakfast. A South African twist on the traditional breakfast will highlight the country’s diverse, colonial heritage. You will check-out shortly after and depart for the third oldest European settlement in South Africa: Paarl. The town is steeped in the local culture with a particular emphasis on viticulture. It is known for producing some of the grandest wines in the Cape, and as a result, it has become a booming destination for connoisseurs. Before indulging in the distinct flavors of Paarl, you will set off on a walking, heritage tour of its surroundings. Your insightful tour guide will fluently describe the history of the settlement as you encounter its endearing architecture. With extraordinarily well-kept museums and monuments to explore, your adventure will be culturally riveting. After the tour, you will transfer to a nearby farm for afternoon lunch and tea. Comfortably sit back amongst the pristine gardens while you peacefully watch the afternoon pass. Here, you may explore the stunning succulents and precious plants that sprawl across the gardens. The traditional South African-style tea will be complete with home-baked delights. A variety of authentic milk tarts, cheesecakes, and quiches will be elegantly served to your table. You will transfer to your astonishing accommodation in Paarl later this afternoon. With world-class amenities and an unrivaled setting, your stay will be phenomenal. After a few hours relaxing in tranquility, your private chauffeur will transfer you to a premier Farm-style restaurant. Agriculture plays a pivotal role in the South African economy, and this particular farm is a leading pioneer of sustainable practices. You will be served meticulously constructed gourmet meals that are made from fresh ingredients from the gardens, and your dinner will be paired with pinnacle Paarl wines to accentuate your lavish experience. You will return to your villa after indulging in dinner and witnessing the remarkable African sunset.

dayInfo.title: Paarl – A World-Renowned Wine Route
dayInfo.description: Beyond its prestigious wine heritage, Paarl’s coffee culture is thriving. The town boasts an array of fabulous roasters, and your morning will be spent enjoying one of its finest cafes. Each cup is made using only the highest quality beans that have been sourced from ethical distributors around the world. You may pair your selected blend with a homemade South African meal. Served in a sophisticated fashion, your marvelous breakfast will leave nothing to be desired. You will savor the flavors of Paarl’s leading wines for the rest of the morning and afternoon. The Paarl Wine Route boasts a multitude of incredible estates. While there are too many estates to explore in its entirety, you will experience the best of Paarl’s famous viticulture route on this jam-packed day of tasting. From ancient estates to modern winemakers, you will truly revel in the diverse range that the region has to offer. All the while, your tastings will be accompanied by cultured guides and immaculate charcuterie boards. You will bask in the subtle notes and wholesome bodies of the various wines that will be presented on this tour. An intricately prepared 5-star meal at the final estate will round off your wine and gastronomical adventure. You will return to your manor later this afternoon for a few hours at your leisure. In the evening, you will meet your private transfer and journey to a cozy restaurant in the region. The intimate dining destination will be complete with gourmet South African cuisine and sweeping views of the valley. You may order award-winning Paarl wines to conclude your splendid day.

dayInfo.title: Franschhoek – Discovering the Classics
dayInfo.description: You will enjoy one final breakfast in Paarl before setting off for Franschhoek. Your private transfer will collect you in the morning and take you on a scenic drive to this endearing town. You will check-in to your gorgeous villa upon arrival. The beauty of Franschhoek lies in its old-world charm and the lush green valley in which it rests. Retaining its architectural appeal, your day will be in full swing with an exploration of the magnificent Franschhoek monuments and museums. You will meet your private chauffeur at your luxurious guesthouse, and your driver will arrive in an exquisitely restored, vintage automobile. You will discover the greater Franschhoek Valley from the comfort of this classic car. Your first stops will be the pinnacle museums and monuments which highlight the history of the Huguenot people who first settled here. The mighty odes to the Franschhoek heritage are in pristine condition, and their beauty is reflected under the gleaming sunshine. You will discover the story of the settlers and encounter century-old relics. The humbling morning will conclude with a trip to a premier restaurant nearby. Arriving at this exquisite destination via a vintage vehicle will be a perfect Franschhoek fit. After all, the town’s antique automobile history is only rivaled by its passionate viticulture heritage. You will delight in a remarkable lunch that will be paired with world-class wines. Overlooking the entire valley, you will dine in absolute pleasure, and after lunch, you will travel along the Franschhoek pass in the comfort of your classic chauffeur-driven vehicle. The vistas of the African sun setting over the horizon will be unforgettable. Later this evening, you will arrive at a gourmet restaurant in the valley. Here, you will sample authentic South African dishes with a sophisticated flair. These award-winning meals will awaken your senses and bring the day to an utterly satisfying close.

dayInfo.title: Franschhoek – Wine Tasting by Tram
dayInfo.description: The Franschhoek Valley is home to many of the Cape’s most significant wine estates, so there will be a seemingly endless variety of distinguished wine destinations to tantalize your taste buds. After breakfast, you will discover the deep wine culture of Franschhoek. You will privately transfer to the Franschhoek Village. Here, you will board a luxurious wine tram for a unique exploration of the famous wine route. The tram will weave its way through the various vineyards in search of the quintessential vintages and blends. You will be accompanied by a knowledgeable wine guide who will share valuable insight throughout your tour. While doing so, you will soak up the picturesque settings. You will also encounter stretches of green vines that wrap around the lush grassy landscape, jagged mountain ranges in the distance that reach for the clouds, and charming buildings that retain an aura of unparalleled dignity. The immersive experience will take you to key tastings at pivotal estates, but the enjoyment will not end here. Beyond delving into the rich flavor varieties, you will be fascinated during a wine lecture and guided, cellar tour. These activities will share behind-the-scenes information regarding the meticulous craft of making wine. The wholesome journey will be complete with a multiple course meal. After delving into the best of the Franschhoek Wine Route, you will settle comfortably at an established restaurant for a first-class dinner.

dayInfo.title: Stellenbosch – Agricultural Excellence
dayInfo.description: An original Cape Dutch farm that is set amongst the green valleys nearby Franschhoek will offer a truly riveting experience. The incredible destination, rooted in organic farming practices, provides a luxurious take on authentic South African agriculture. This comes at no ethical expense as the organic farm is underpinned by values of sustainability, diversity, and collaboration. You will delight in an exquisite farm-grown breakfast before participating in an engaging activity of your choice. From cheese making to succulent growing, the possibilities will be endless. After which, you will depart for the renowned town of Stellenbosch. This charming destination is another pivotal viticulture landmark in the Western Cape. The town has a firm hold on South African history, and there will be much to explore during your stay. For example, the well-kept Dutch-colonial architecture provides a compelling heritage. A cultured guide will walk you through the history of the town, leading you to incredible odes to the old-world and significant heritage sites. The tour will culminate with an authentic top-tier meal at a premier restaurant that overlooks this diverse landscape. You will check-in to your luxury suite later today. Then, you will have the opportunity to relax in style at a 5-star spa. Let the holiday sink in as you unwind with any of the marvelous treatments on offer. Feeling completely refreshed from the spa, you will set off for a sumptuous supper. The meticulously crafted South African meals that will be set amongst the marvelous green fields of Stellenbosch will finish your day perfectly.

dayInfo.title: Stellenbosch – Stellenbosch’s Immersive Flavors
dayInfo.description: You will transfer to a premier Stellenbosch wine estate on your eighth day for a delicious breakfast. This will kick off your final day of tasting South Africa’s most remarkable wines. You will witness a surreal duck parade after your delightful breakfast. The innovative pest control program, which is pioneered by the estate, will be a sight to behold. A flock of over 1,200 Indian Runner Ducks assists the farmers by cleaning up the pest population, which can negatively impact the estate’s vineyard harvest. The entire performance will be set amongst the estates beautifully kept gardens. After the performance concludes, you will transfer to the next leading estate for a unique Segway tour of the vineyards. The off-road tour will highlight the vineyards beauty and the processes behind the distinct vintages and blends. As you ride around under the sun and feel the breeze against your cheeks, you will revel in the freedom of this unique experience. After immersing yourself in this behind-the-scenes activity, you will continue the Stellenbosch wine tour where you will make your way to a few more of its renowned farms for guided taste tours of their refined blends. The tour will culminate with an incredible sunset dinner. As you savor each sip of wine, you will soak up the marvelous vistas of the illuminated orange sky that surrounds you. The multiple course meal will satisfy your every craving as you end your day of distinguished tasting.

dayInfo.title: Cape Town – Sights from Great Heights
dayInfo.description: On your last day of the tour, you will wake early in the morning for an unforgettable view of the greater Western Cape. This time, you will take to the skies in a private hot air balloon to witness the incredible sunrise. From these heights, you will capture the region like never before. Encounter the estates and restaurants that you enjoyed previously on this tour from a completely unique perspective. Upon your return to the ground, you will celebrate with a glass of exceptional sparkling wine and delight in a fancy breakfast to conclude your vacation in great fashion. After enjoying the delightful meal, you will meet your private transfer who will transfer you to Cape Town International Airport where you will soon depart for home. Though the trip may be at its end, you will leave with great knowledge of South Africa’s wines and reminisce of all the exquisite, gastronomical highlights.
